Yeah, that's what I thought. Then I'm going to stay with the excellent Carenado series.

CLS Makes Excellent Airbus Planes with Just Flight. Certainly the best I've used. Especially the Just Flight A340/330 Pro Series has a fully functional MCDU. Good Up  and I agree that the carenado little planes are not only amazing looking but the fly great and the VC's are excellent.
request flight1 Pilatus PC-12 for fsx. thanks

Thanks a bunch, Milton. Lots of good upz lately, Supaturtle. Now I can flame the developer. Come on, CLS suck flamingo cock. Their Airbuses are accurate from a cosmetic point of view, but the avionics and flight computers are grotesquely simplified and downright WRONG. Another (bi)product from CLS are their texture packages which make your sim look like Elizabeth Taylor's bowel movements, with just two clicks of a button. This GA aircraft looks boring and uninspired, but I'll take it like the thief I am and add it to my disgusting log of warez, of which I have been able to try roughly 25%, but I so enjoy downloading it. Fuck me.
